# Audio {-}

You know the old adage 'if you can't hear them you can't work them'? Well, the last step in that chain,
apart from your ears, is your speaker! Generally speaking there are a number of things you can do to
improve your audio. One day I'll hopefully write up an article, but here are a couple of good references
to chase in the meantime:

- [Loudspeaker Desing Considerations for Amateur Radio, Steve Dick, K1RF](http://www.hcra.org/wp-content/uploads/2015/05/Loudspeaker-Design-Considerations-for-Amateur-Radio-RevD.pdf)
- Watch some [Bob Heil K9EID on YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Lx2dP0lOQL0)
